select 'APPROVAL' || to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') || APPR_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into approval values(#{appr_seq},#{draftername},#{drafterid},to_char(sysdate,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),#{title},#{content}, #{startdate},#{enddate},1,#{docregno},#{drafterdeptid},#{drafterdeptname},#{regno},#{finalapprover},#{approvaldate})
mapper.select: select a.appr_seq, a.title, a.drafterid, a.draftername, a.regdate ,p.participant_seq, p.approvalstatus, p.approvaltype, p.signerid from approval a inner join participant p on a.appr_seq = p.appr_seq and p.approvalstatus = 4098 and a.status not in(4096,256) and p.approvaltype = 4 and p.signerid = #{signerid} order by a.appr_seq desc

select a.appr_seq, a.title, a.drafterid, a.draftername, a.regdate, p.participant_seq, p.approvalstatus, p.approvaltype, p.signerid from approval a inner join participant p on a.appr_seq = p.appr_seq and p.signerid = #{signerid} and a.status != 256 and (p.approvalstatus =1024 and a.status =4096 or(p.approvalstatus !=1024 and a.status != 4096)) group by a.appr_seq, a.title, a.drafterid, a.draftername, a.regdate, p.participant_seq, p.approvalstatus, p.approvaltype, p.signerid order by a.appr_seq desc
mapper.update: update approval set status = 256, approvaldate = to_char(sysdate,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), finalapprover =(select f.signerid from ( select row_number() over ( partition by t.appr_seq ORDER BY participant_seq desc) rindex, t.* from participant t where t.appr_seq = #{appr_seq}) f where f.rindex = 1) where appr_seq = #{appr_seq}
mapper.select: select u.id, u.deptid, d.abbreviation from member u , dept d where u.deptid = d.deptid and u.id = #{id}
select * from approval where appr_seq = #{appr_seq} and status = 256
select a.appr_seq, a.drafterdeptid, a.drafterid, d.abbreviation, d.deptcode from approval a inner join dept d on a.drafterdeptid = d.deptid where a.status = 256 and a.appr_seq = #{appr_seq}

(select f.* from( select row_number() over(partition by t.deptid order by a.appr_seq desc)rindex, t.* from dept t, approval a where t.deptid = a.drafterdeptid and t.deptid = #{deptid})f where f.rindex = 1)
(select f.* from ( select row_number() over ( partition by t.deptid ORDER BY deptdocno desc) rindex, t.* from document t where t.deptid = #{deptid}) f where f.rindex = 1)
